title: Parrots, the universe and everything
description: Blind river dolphins, reclusive lemurs, a parrot as fearless as it is lovelorn ... Douglas Adams' close encounters with these rare and unusual animals reveal that evolution, ever ingenious, can be fickle too -- in a University of California talk that sparkles with his trademark satiric wit.
author: Douglas Adams
keywords: TED, talks, biodiversity, biology, comedy, life, religion, storytelling, writing, humor
